reporting-org.narrative: AICS - Italian Agency for Cooperation and Development

description.narrative: Strutturare la rappresentanza, le conoscenze e le competenze delle organizzazioni delle diaspore al fine di farle diventare da un lato un interlocutore stabile per la Cooperazione Italiana e dall’altro di contribuire a costruire una nuova narrazione sul contributo delle migrazioni allo sviluppo del paese e dei suoi rapporti con l’estero

Support and improve the representation, knowledge and skills of the diaspora organizations, in order to let them become a stable interlocutor for the Italian Cooperation and to contribute to new narrative on the contribution of migration to the development of the country and of its relations with foreign countries.

organisation.narrative: AICS - Italian Agency for Cooperation and Development

sector.narrative: Facilitation of orderly, safe, regular and responsible migration and mobility

tag.narrative: Encourage and promote effective public, public-private and civil society partnerships, building on the experience and resourcing strategies of partnerships
Strengthen the means of implementation and revitalize the global partnership for sustainable development
